Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Northbound Reroute near 18th/Damen
ShortDescription: NB 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 18th, Ashland, Roosevelt and Damen due to, street blockage near 18th/Damen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 18th, Ashland, Roosevelt and Damen due to, street blockage near 18th/Damen.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #93 California/Dodge Temporary Reroute at Dodge/Main
ShortDescription: 93 California/Dodge buses are temporarily rerouted via Dodge, Oakton, Ashbury and Dempster due to, street blockage near Dodge/Main.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#93 California/Dodge buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Dodge, Oakton, Ashbury and Dempster due to, street blockage near Dodge/Main.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Exchange
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Exchange, 83rd, Yates and 79th due to, street blockage near 79th/Exchange.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Exchange, 83rd, Yates and 79th due to, street blockage near 79th/Exchange.

Allow extra travel time.
